## Description {#details}

Zippy iterator that uses the second iterator for comparisons.

For the increment to be safe, the second range has to be the shortest. Returns <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/enumerator-result">enumerator&#95;result</a></code> on dereference to provide <code>.index()</code> and <code>.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/detail/#a3fe429695b1d6a60635b1e490092037e">value()</a></code> member functions. Note: Because the dereference operator returns <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/enumerator-result">enumerator&#95;result</a></code> as a value instead of a reference and does not strictly conform to the C++17&#39;s definition of forward iterator. However, it satisfies all the forward&#95;iterator requirements that the <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/detail/zip-common">zip&#95;common</a></code> and <code>zippy</code> depend on and fully conforms to the C++20 definition of forward iterator. This is similar to <code>std::vector&lt;bool&gt;::iterator</code> that returns bit reference wrappers on dereference.

Definition at line 2269 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlextras-h">STLExtras.h</a>.
